nodes.description: 2006年1月，Dange、Kalsangra和Joshi在Bagli对炸弹训练进行两日培训，涵盖爆炸物组装、定时装置使用及武器操作
nodes.support_text: Kamal also led the NIA to Bagli near Indore where the bombers were trained in January 2006 by Dange, Kalsangra and Joshi.

nodes.description: 2007年，Samjhauta Express列车在印巴边境爆炸，造成68人死亡（含43名巴基斯坦人），Rajendra Pehalwan和Lokesh Sharma参与炸弹安装
nodes.support_text: The fresh chargesheet will name Kamal Chauhan and Amit Chauhan alias Hakla as the two bombers who along with Lokesh Sharma and Rajendra Pehalwan allegedly planted the four suitcase bombs in the train that killed 68 people, including 43 Pakistan nationals.

nodes.description: 2007年，Joshi在Dewas被发现死亡，其尸体与早期调查关联
nodes.support_text: Sunil Joshi  who was found dead in 2007 in Dewas.

nodes.description: 2010年，NIA正式接管Samjhauta Express爆炸案调查

nodes.description: 2024年2月，NIA逮捕Kamal Chauhan，其供词揭示训练细节及炸弹组装地点
nodes.support_text: The NIA arrested Kamal Chauhan in February this year and was able to identify the bombers.

nodes.support_text: The NIA is likely to file its second chargesheet into the 2007 Samjhauta Express blast at a Panchkula court in the next couple of days.
